content: k2tog k21 k2tog yo k2 knit 5 row now increase on the front flap rs k5 m1l knit to last 5 sts m1r k5 ws k5 purl to last 5 sts k5 repeat these two row until you have 59 stitches total body joining you now have 27 sts back flap and 59 sts front flap on the rs co 16 sts on the rh needle using the backward loop method knit across 59 sts of the front flap co 16 sts knit across 27 stitches of the back flap join work in the round - 118 sts total work in k1 p1 ribbing for 15 cm place markers to mark leg divisions pm work 59 sts in rib pattern pm work 59 sts in pattern kfb move marker back 1 position so it sits between the two kfb stitches the original and the newly created stitch work 58 sts pfb move marker back so it sits between the two pfb sts work 58 sts divide for legs place the next 60 sts one leg on a holder now join the remaining 60 sts in the round and continue in pattern p1 k1 for one round legs option 1 slightly flared leg work 60 sts in pattern for 24 cm bind off using a stretchy bind-off repeat for the second leg option 2 slightly tapered leg work in pattern for 12 cm pm at the beginning of the round sm ssk *k1 p1* to last 2 sts ssk work 5 rounds in pattern ssk *k1 p1* to last 3 sts k1 k2tog work 5 rounds in pattern ssk *k1 p1* to last 2 sts k2tog work 5 rounds in pattern ssk *k1 p1* to last 3 sts k1 k2tog work 5 rounds in pattern ssk *k1 p1* to last 3 sts k2tog work 5 rounds in pattern bobble using a stretchy bind-off repeat for the second leg finishing sew the small hole between legs shut using mattress stitch sew buttons onto straps you can add several buttons to allow for multiple sizes make sure to attach them securely for the baby s safety weave in all ends block if desired 1 1design by psychiaknits pattern is protected by a creative commons copyright you may print the pattern for personal use but please do not sell the pattern without written permission from the author who can be reached at psychiaknits@gmail com kindly tag @psychiaknits in your finished work on instagram for further questions email psychiaknits@gmail com
